ai-iti43:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti43:2.1_0: “There is, monks, an unborn, unbecome, unmade, unconditioned.
ai-iti43:2.2_0: If there were no escape from the born, unproduced, unmade, and unconditioned, an escape is found from the born, created, conditioned, and made.
ai-iti43:2.3_0: But since there is an unborn, unproduced, unmade, and unconditioned, an escape is found from the born, produced, made, and conditioned.”
ai-iti43:2.4_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti43:3.3_0: wrapped in old age and death,
ai-iti43:4.1_0: generated by food and the conduit to rebirth:
ai-iti43:4.2_0: that’s not fit to delight in.
ai-iti43:4.3_0: The escape from that is peaceful,
ai-iti43:4.4_0: beyond the scope of logic, everlasting,
ai-iti43:5.3_0: the cessation of all painful things,
ai-iti43:6.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti43:6.2_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
